insights.insight: Bounce rate is 50.9%, which is above the industry average
insights.action: Optimize landing pages and improve page load speed

insights.insight: Google Ads CTR of 4.69% is excellent
insights.action: Increase budget for Google Ads campaigns

recommendations.title: Improve Page Load Speed
recommendations.description: Optimize images and reduce server response time to improve user experience

recommendations.title: Implement Retargeting Campaigns
recommendations.description: Create retargeting campaigns for users who visited but didn't convert

recommendations.title: Launch Email Marketing Automation
recommendations.description: Set up automated email sequences for new customers and cart abandonment
